text: Ana hu'negu Asiria kini ne'mo'a vuno ana tare kumatmimpinti vahera ha' ome huzmagatereteno, tavava ozafaramine, kasefa veatamine, zamavufaga avapako zamagia nona omanesiaza zamavareno kina ome huzmanteku vugahie. Ana hanige'za Isipi mopare zamavufaga zamavapako mani'ne'za tusi zamagazegu hugahaze.
